Text: Rev James Lapslie (1750-1824) was Scottish minister and local historian serving Campsie.

Text: James Lapslie:  He played a role in the trial of Thomas Muir of Huntershill in 1793.

Text: James Lapslie:  Kay drew him and dubbed him the Pension Hunter at the trial.
